item.ENTRY: anderes Objekt mit gleicher Bewertung vorhanden
mehrere Objekte mit gleicher Bewertung vorhanden

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Objekt zu Klassen: Table Control KLASTAB

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: CALL SUBSCREEN OBJEKT INCLUDING G_PROG_OBJECT D5XX_DYNNR.
LOOP AT KLASTAB WITH CONTROL TC_OBJ_CLASS "WFS
FIELD RMCLF-PAGPOS MODULE SEITE_REQ ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Klasse zu Klassen: Table Control KLASTAB

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: LOOP AT KLASTAB WITH CONTROL TC_OBJ_CLASS "WFS
FIELD RMCLF-PAGPOS MODULE SEITE_REQ ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Objekte zur Klasse: Klasse wird neu zugeordnet (Table Cntrl)

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: loop at klastab with control tc_obj_class "WFS
field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request. "WFS

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Objekte zur Klasse: Übers.Klassen und Objekte (Table Cntrl)

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: LOOP AT G_OBJ_INDX_TAB WITH CONTROL TC_OBJ_CLASS "WFS
*-- Index_NEU wird auch für OBJTABI verwendet
FIELD RMCLF-PAGPOS MODULE SEITE_REQ ON REQUEST. "WFS

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Klassifizierung Objekt: Neuzuordnung eines Objekts (Träger)

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: call subscreen objekt including program1 d5xx_dynnr.
field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Klassifizierung: WWS Warengruppenhierarchie (Table Control)

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: LOOP AT KLASTAB WITH CONTROL TC_OBJ_CLASS "WFS
FIELD RMCLF-WGHIE1 MODULE FUELLEN_OBJ ON REQUEST.
FIELD RMCLF-KREUZ MODULE MMARKIEREN ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Klasse zu Klassen: Table Control KLASTAB
Klassifizierung: Änderungsdienst
Klassifizierung: Objektreferenz
Pop-UP: Auswahl des Objekts

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: FIELD RMCLF-RADIO MODULE SETZEN_KREUZ ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Klassifizierung: Inkonsistenzen beim löschen
Filter der Objekte in CL24

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: FIELD RMCLF-KREUZ MODULE SETZEN_KREUZ_D604 ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Festlegung Anwendungssichten

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: FIELD RMCLF-ABTEI MODULE RMCLF_ABTEI_CHK ON REQUEST.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Clfy 99: CL20, Zuordnung Objekt zu Klassen

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: call subscreen objekt including g_prog_cbcm dynpro1xx.
call subscreen subscr_zuord including c_prog_myself g_alloc_dynnr.
call subscreen subscr_bewert including c_prog_ctms g_value_dynnr.
field rmclf-klart module new_screen on request.
field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Clfy 99: vom Obj, Zuordnung Objekt zu Klassen und Bewertung

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: call subscreen objekt including g_prog_object d5xx_dynnr.
call subscreen subscr_zuord including c_prog_myself g_alloc_dynnr.
* open characteristics subscreen at the beginning
call subscreen subscr_bewert including c_prog_ctms g_value_dynnr.
field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Clfy 99: vom Obj, (Kopf und Bewertungsbild)

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: call subscreen objekt including g_prog_object d5xx_dynnr.
* open characteristics subscreen at the beginning
call subscreen subscr_bewert including c_prog_ctms g_value_dynnr.
* field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Clfy 99: CL24, Zuordnung Objekte einer Klasse

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * main screen: objects of a class
call subscreen subscr_zuord including c_prog_myself g_alloc_dynnr.
call subscreen subscr_bewert including c_prog_ctms g_value_dynnr.
field rmclf-klart module new_screen on request.
field rmclf-pagpos module seite_req on request.
* ! modules seite, ... in object dynpros clfm/02xx

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL20N: Liste Klassen, lang

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: loop at klastab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: neue Zuordnung Klasse/Klasse, lang

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: long table control with all classes of a class
loop at klastab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: alle Objekte einer Klasse, lang

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: long table control with all objects of a class
loop at g_obj_indx_tab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: neue Zuordnung Objekt/Klasse, lang

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: long table control with selected objects of a class
call subscreen objekt including program1 d5xx_dynnr.

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL20N: Liste Klassen, kurz

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: loop at klastab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: neue Zuordnung Klasse/Klasse, kurz

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: short table control with all classes of a class
loop at klastab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: alle Objekte einer Klasse, kurz

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: short table control with all objects of a class
loop at g_obj_indx_tab with control tc_obj_class

HEADER.DESCRIPT: Subscreen, CL24N: neue Zuordnung Objekt/Klasse, kurz

RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * subscreen: short table control with selected objects of a class
call subscreen objekt including program1 d5xx_dynnr.

RSMPE_STAT.INT_NOTE: 4.6 TA Object, Only Value Assignment Subscreen
KLASTAB Processing Status for CL Transactions
KLASTAB Processing Status for CL Transactions

Dialog Box for Selecting Objects for CL24
Dialog Box for Selecting Objects for CL24
